title: BaronReplays Record Failed, the reason is reason?
body:
Anybody else have this problem or know of a fix?

Will record custom games fine but nothing else.

replies.body:
My issue is exactly the same. Custom games only are recording. I noticed that it wasn't automatically picking up the "League of Legends.exe" path in the settings and manually set it, but that made no difference.

--EDIT--

Dug into the log file. 
> Recorder       3 [12/28/2014 2:08:27 AM] Get http://192.64.174.163:80/observer-mode/rest/consumer/getLastChunkInfo/NA1/3526660131/30000/token failed, The remote server returned an error: (404) Not Found.

>(repeats 7 times)

> Recorder       3 [12/28/2014 2:10:48 AM] Get http://spectator.na2.lol.riotgames.com:80/observer-mode/rest/consumer/getLastChunkInfo/NA1/3526660131/30000/token failed, The remote server returned an error: (404) Not Found.

> Recorder       3 [12/28/2014 2:11:09 AM] Get http://spectator.na2.lol.riotgames.com:8088/observer-mode/rest/consumer/getLastChunkInfo/NA1/3526660131/30000/token failed, Unable to connect to the remote server

> Recorder       3 [12/28/2014 2:11:10 AM] Recording failed because of ErrorGettingSpecMode

When it did work on custom games, it doesn't write what the spectator server address is. 404 indicates the address the program is using is bad. Also I signed in on my EUW account by accident. I'm having problems using the program on NA, but I should see if it works on EUW now that I think about it.

I have experienced it (last night) but haven't investigated yet. I dismissed it at first for being an issue with the Legend of the Poro King game mode but my normal game didn't record either. If I find something out tonight I will update.
